title: Use React for Frontend Framework

technicalStory.title: Select Frontend Framework for New Web Application
technicalStory.description: As a development team, we need to select and implement a modern frontend framework to replace our vanilla JavaScript implementation that has become difficult to maintain.
acceptanceCriteria: Framework must have strong community support
Team must be able to deliver MVP within 3 months
Framework must support modern build tools and testing

context.problem: We need to select a frontend framework for our new web application that supports rapid development and has strong community support.
context.background: The current application uses vanilla JavaScript which has become difficult to maintain as complexity grows.
constraints: Team has limited experience with Angular
Need to deliver MVP within 3 months
assumptions: The application will have complex state management needs
We will need to support modern browsers only

decisionDrivers.rationale: Team productivity is critical for meeting deadlines
Need access to libraries and solutions
Application needs to be responsive but not real-time

consideredOptions.name: React
consideredOptions.description: Facebook's component-based library for building user interfaces
cons: Not a full framework - need additional libraries

consideredOptions.name: Vue.js
pros: Full framework with router and state management

consideredOptions.name: Vanilla JavaScript with Web Components
consideredOptions.description: Use native web standards without a framework

decision.rationale: React provides the best balance of developer experience, community support, and performance for our needs. The team's existing experience will help meet tight deadlines.
decision.implementation: We will use Create React App for initial setup, Redux Toolkit for state management, and React Router for navigation.

positive: Access to vast ecosystem of components
negative: Need to choose and integrate additional libraries
Potential for decision fatigue with many options
neutral: Will need to establish coding standards for React
Team will need training on React best practices

notes: Consider migrating to Next.js in the future if SSR becomes a requirement.
